'''''Not So Strait Is the Gate''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must use [[Arkhium Lumenite]] to open the door to [[Bravais' Hidden Study]] as part of the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] "[[Arkhium Forge]]".

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is a reference to the French novel ''{{w|Strait is the Gate}}'' written by {{w|André Gide}}.
